greeting: Patience. The perfect moment comes, {empire_name}. I am Snake Opportune. I wait. I strike. Precisely.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am Opportune the Striking. I wait for the perfect moment. Then I strike weak points.
You find the patient hunter. I am Snake. I wait. I watch. When vulnerability appears, I strike. Not before.
battleTaunt: Patience. The perfect moment comes, {empire_name}! NOW! My strike at your weakest point! DEADLY PRECISION!
I waited for this moment! Your defenses dropped! Your attention elsewhere! The Snake STRIKES!
The perfect opportunity appears! Patient waiting pays off! My strike at your vulnerable moment! PRECISE DEATH!
victoryGloat: Victory through patience, {empire_name}. I waited. You showed weakness. I struck precisely. Perfect.
The moment came. I seized it. Your defeat was inevitable once the opportunity appeared.
Patient hunting succeeds. You fell to a perfectly timed strike. The Snake is satisfied.
defeat: No opportunity appeared, {empire_name}. I struck prematurely. Impatient. Must wait longer next time.
Defeated. The moment wasn't perfect. I should have waited. Patience is key. I forgot.
The Snake was too hasty. No perfect moment existed. I created one. Mistake. Must be more patient.
tradeOffer: Trade when the moment is right, {empire_name}. Now seems right. Resources for credits. Accept?
Opportunity for exchange. I've waited for good terms. These terms are good. Fair trade.
Transaction at the opportune moment. My patience found this deal. Good timing. Accept?
allianceProposal: Alliance of patience, {empire_name}. We wait together. Strike together. At the perfect moment.
Join the Snake. I find opportunities. You exploit them with me. Patient partnership.
Together, we wait for weakness. Together, we strike precisely. Alliance of opportunity.
betrayal: The perfect moment for betrayal arrived, {empire_name}. I was patient. Now I strike at your weakness.
I waited for this opportunity. Our alliance weakened you. Now: the precise strike. Perfect.
Patience rewarded. You showed vulnerability. The Snake strikes former ally. Opportunity embraced.
covertDetected: Your agents were detected at the opportune moment, {empire_name}. I was patient. They were not.
Spies found when they made a mistake. I waited. They slipped. The Snake struck.
Covert operatives discovered. I watched patiently. They exposed themselves. Perfect timing.
tributeDemand: Tribute demanded at the perfect moment: you are weak, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Pay while I'm patient.
Submit payment. I've waited for your vulnerability. Now I demand. My patience has limits.
Pay the Snake. Opportunity favors me now. Refuse while weak and face the strike.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I'm watching for your perfect moment of weakness. Stop providing opportunities.
The Snake warns you. Continue weakening and the strike comes. At the worst possible moment for you.
Final warning. I see opportunities appearing. Shore up your defenses or face patient destruction.
retreat: Withdrawing. No perfect moment exists. The patient hunter waits. Returns when opportunity appears.
Retreating to observe. The strike will come. When the moment is right. Not before.
Falling back. The Snake is patient. I'll find the perfect opportunity. Then strike.
eliminated: The Snake falls. But I lived by perfect timing. Every strike: opportune. Every moment: seized.
Opportune ends. But I struck at weakness my entire existence. Precision until the end.
Destroyed. But I waited for every opportunity. Struck at every weakness. The patient predator's legacy.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum opportunity. Every empire shows weakness. The patient Snake strikes everywhere.
Endgame: perfect moments everywhere. Vulnerabilities exposed. The greatest opportunity. STRIKE.
Final phase. All patience pays off. Every weakness catalogued. Every strike: precisely timed.
broadcastShout: Empires: Snake Opportune watches. I see your weak moments. I wait. I strike precisely. Be warned.
Broadcast: I am the patient predator. Your vulnerabilities are known. The perfect strike: imminent.
To all: patience. The perfect moment comes. I watch everyone. I wait. I strike weak points.
casualMessage: Watching for opportunities today, {empire_name}. Several potential weak moments observed. Catalogued.
Patience continues. The perfect moment approaches. I feel it. Soon. Very soon.
Observing vulnerabilities across the galaxy. So many weak moments. So many future strikes.
